body.name: BS-MALL Makeup LED Case Makeup Brush Holder With LED Mirror Makeup Tool Organizer Bag Makeup Brush Bag with Shoulder…
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 25 mins
features: 【Light Up Your Beauty Routine】: Our Makeup LED Case doesn't just store your makeup, but makes application easier with an attached, removable mirror and adjustable LED lighting. Dial in the perfect illumination to suit your needs with three different color options.

【Versatile 3 Color Fill Lights】– Our unique case includes a 4.3*10*9 in full-screen mirror with adjustable light-up functionality. While a gentle touch easily adjusts color temperature between cool, natural, and warm light. The mirror is designed to make applying your makeup a breeze, wherever you are.

【Your Personal Mobile Vanity】 – BS-MALL's makeup case elevates your beauty routine to a whole new level. Our design includes Five detachable EVA partitions and a large brush storage board with 7 compartment bags, so you can accommodate multiple cosmetics and brushes of different sizes. The adjustable compartments allow you to customize the case to suit your beauty needs.
【Enhanced Detailing & Precision】: The Makeup LED Case also comes with a bonus 5x magnifying mirror, allowing for attention to detail and precision in your makeup application.

【Amazingly Thoughtful Gift Idea】 – Want to stay organized while traveling in style? This product is perfect for you! It can store not only your cosmetics but also your Jewelry, Electronic Accessories, Camera, Essential oil, Toiletries, Shaving Kit, and Valuable objects. Compact and convenient, this case offers perfect lighting for on-the-spot touch-ups anytime, anywhere. A great gift for anyone who loves makeup!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Ultimate Gift for the Beauty Lover in Your Life Our makeup organizer case keeps your cosmetics tidy and stylish. As a gift, it's a memory-maker, adding an elegant touch to special occasions. It’s the perfect surprise for Christmas, New Year, Birthdays,

Experience flexibility and elegance in one product with BS-MALL The case offers ample storage space for makeup brushes of various sizes (brushes not included), and its double zippers ensure longevity. Its adjustable lighting feature caters to different light requirements, while the angle-adjustable mirror accommodates various makeup needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars now I want one
reviews.reviewText: In love with this product. Bought it for my 17 yr old going to Spain in March. I let her use it early on a family trip last month. Everything in one spot. I used it as much as she did. Just sit on the bed and did my make up. No waiting on my turn for the mirror/bathroom. It's awesome. I'll be getting another one for myself after Christmas 🎄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves it.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter and another one for her friend for Christmas. They both love them. Great quality and a lot of nice features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderfully pleasant surprise!
reviews.reviewText: This is not only an excellent looking case and product, but it is at a price tag that you cannot beat. Everything about this case I have been impressed with. From its durability and quality instruction, to its added amenities, such as the touch, light mirror, and the very elegant looking make up brush. It appears luxuries and expensive… when it IS absolutely luxurious, but it’s NOT expensive! Yaaay!! Who doesn’t just love that. I didn’t expect this because it was not an expensive purchase. But it looks like it is. You won’t be disappointed. The color is not too bright or headache pink, but just the right shade of pink, that it goes with the high end feel of the Case and product. I like the different shades of the touch control mirror light. And just the fact that you can change it with touch is so convenient. A an excellent design call on their part with that one. Overall very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Functionable & Great For Travel
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to add to my traveling makeup/skincare case collection. It's comparable to my others, there are some minor flaws on the edges of the piping but it does not affect the function of the case. It's more of a minor cosmetic design flaw.I love these cases for travel, esp. with the LED rechargeable/removable mirror. The customizable shockproof dividers are awesome, and love the extras that it comes with. It is a travel makeup/skincare travel case at an affordable price point. Perfect for MUAs or for anyone who travels with makeup and or skincare who wants to keep their products organized and secure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glowing Glam Sessions
reviews.reviewText: My makeup routine has reached a new level of sophistication with this LED case. It not only keeps my brushes organized but also provides perfect lighting for flawless makeup application.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable Makeup Case
reviews.reviewText: This makeup case is perfect for someone who travels or for doing your makeup somewhere besides the bathroom. It has removable dividers making it easy to adjust depending on your spacial needs. You can make them big compartments or smaller ones. The removable mirror is perfect for me! It hold a charge for a long time and it has different modes as well, ensuring that you look your best in any lighting. It's also very sturdy durable materials. Mine had no flaws that I could see at all from the manufacturing process. I definitely think everyone who does their own makeup should have a case like this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent makeup Bag
reviews.reviewText: I must admit this is a really super nice makeup carrier/case. In this set you not only get the makeup vanity case, but it comes with an enormous LED mirror- along with a brush holder and makeup brush. Everything you need to keep your makeup items safe during travel or even as a stand alone makeup carrier case. It is very well designed and the construction is solid. I did not feel that this is made with poor materials, rather made with excellent materials. This makeup case offers so much in terms of organization. It has removable dividers so you can change up the capacity to fit your tailored needs.The mirror is a touch screen- yo can adjust the brightness with just the touch of your finger. It has three different lighting modes.*Cool Light*Natural Light*Warm Light*Five partitionsDimensions are as follows: 10.24 x 9.06 x 3.84 inchesThe mirror illuminates and has a 5x magnification which I do love about this case. The powder brush is super soft and sets my setting powder lovely. The size of this makeup bag is impressive, it is not overly large - simple to affix to your luggage. This covers everything you need to do your makeup or do touch ups. I like that it's so portable and does not take up a lot of room when I travel. Overall, I find that this is an excellent makeup case set. Based on how well it's working and the quality- I would recommend this brand to other consumers. Excellent gift idea as well, my teenage daughters are thrilled. Well done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful makeup bag that I never thought I needed
reviews.reviewText: I've been holding off on getting this and I don't even know why because of my goodness! It's just what I need!it is big and compact. I can reorganize to the way I like because of the dividers and I can put big makeup products. It's big that I can put some of my skincare products for traveling. I like the 3 lights LED options and the little magnifying glass, I just wish it stayed on. Its case itself is very durable and seems well made. it came with a brush which is a plus even though I don't really need it. I really like that I can do my make-up in the car without having to jungle looking for make-up because I can see everything. It also came with a brush holder organizer which is nice to keep it “clean” and doesn't get makeup on all over. Overall perfect for travel or for on the go and to just have.
